Pegatron tried to not get asleep but he couldn`t  stand up anymore.
Pegatron:Dammit...must...not....escape.....
Siref:EVERYBODY STAND BACK!
Lyas grabbed Pegatron and follow Siref who took his shield out to 
protect the team.
